tuv.seg: Equality in the workplace
Comhionannas san ionad oibre
The Employment Equality Acts 1998–2015 outlaw discrimination in a wide range of employment and employment-related areas
Cuireann na hAchtanna um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta 1998-2015 cosc ar idirdhealú i réimse leathan fostaíochta agus cúrsaí a bhaineann le fostaíocht
These include recruitment and promotion; equal pay; working conditions; training or experience; dismissal and harassment including sexual harassment
Baineann siad sin le hearcaíocht agus cur chun cinn; pá cothrom; dálaí oibre; oiliúint nó taithí; dífhostú nó ciapadh lena n-áirítear ciapadh gnéasach
The legislation defines discrimination as treating one person in a less favourable way than another person based on any of the following 9 grounds:

Tugann an reachtaíocht sainmhíniú ar idirdhealú mar caitheamh le duine amháin ar bhealach nach bhfuil chomh fabhrach leis an gcaoi a chaitear le duine eile agus é sin ar aon cheann den 9 bhfáth seo a leanas:
• Gender: this means man, woman or transsexual
• Inscne: ciallaíonn sé seo fear, bean nó trasghnéasach
• Civil status: includes single, married, separated, divorced, widowed people, civil partners and former civil partners
• Stádas sibhialta: cuimsíonn sé seo daoine singile, pósta, scartha, colscartha, baintreacha/baintreacha fir , páirtnéirí sibhialta agus iar-pháirtnéirí sibhialta
• Family status: this refers to the parent of a person under 18 years or the resident primary carer or parent of a person with a disability
• Stádas teaghlaigh: tagraíonn sé seo do thuismitheoir duine atá faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois nó do phríomhchuramóir nó do thuismitheoir cónaitheach duine a bhfuil míchumas air nó uirthi
• Sexual orientation: includes gay, lesbian, bisexual and heterosexual
• Claonadh gnéasach: áirítear leis seo daoine homaighnéasacha, leispiacha, déghnéasacha agus heitrighnéasacha
• Religion: means religious belief, background, outlook or none
• Reiligiún: cialaíonn sé sin creideamh reiligiúnach, cúlra nó dearcadh reiligiúnach nó easpa creidimh nó dearcaidh reiligiúnaigh
• Age: this does not apply to a person aged under 16
• Aois: ní bhaineann sé seo le duine faoi bhun a 16
• Disability: includes people with physical, intellectual, learning, cognitive or emotional disabilities and a range of medical conditions
• Míchumas: áirítear leis seo daoine a bhfuil míchumais fhisiceacha, intleachta, foghlamtha, choigníocha nó mothúchánacha orthu nó réimse riochtaí míochaine
• Race: includes race, skin colour, nationality or ethnic origin
• Cine: áirítear le seo cine, dath craicinn, náisiúnacht nó bunús eitneach
• Membership of the Traveller community
• Ballraíocht den Lucht Siúil
Discrimination is defined as less favourable treatment
Is é sainmhíniú a thugtar ar idirdhealú ná níos lú fabhar a thabhairt do dhuine
An employee is said to be discriminated against if they are treated less favourably than another is, has been or would be treated in a comparable situation on any of the above 9 grounds

Is féidir a rá go bhfuil idirdhealú á dhéanamh in aghaidh fostaí má thugtar níos lú fabhar dó nó di ná mar a tugadh, nó a thabharfaí, do dhuine eile i gcás cosúil leis ar aon cheann den 9 bhfáth thuas

To establish direct discrimination, a direct comparison must be made, for example, in the case of disability discrimination the comparison must be between a person who has a disability and another who has not, or between persons with different disabilities

Má tá cás idirdhealaithe le cruthú caithfear comparáid dhíreach a dhéanamh idir dhá chás. Mar shampla, má tá cás idirdhealaithe ar bhunús míchumais le cruthú caithfear comparáid a dhéanamh idir duine a bhfuil míchumas air nó uirthi agus duine nach bhfuil nó idir bheirt a bhfuil míchumais éagsúla orthu
Indirect discrimination occurs when practices or policies that do not appear to discriminate against one group more than another actually have a discriminatory impact
Tarlaíonn idirdhealú indíreach nuair nach cosúil go ndéanann beartais nó cleachtais idirdhealú in aghaidh grúpa amháin seachas grúpa eile ach go mbíonn tionchar idirdhealaitheach acu i ndáiríre
It can also happen where a requirement that may appear non-discriminatory adversely affects a particular group or class of persons
Féadfaidh idirdhealú tarlú freisin nuair a bhíonn riachtanas ann, agus bíodh is nach cosúil go bhfuil sé idirdhealaitheach, go mbíonn drochthionchar aige ar ghrúpa nó ar aicme daoine
Specific situations covered by employment equality legislation
Cásanna faoi leith a chuimsíonn an reachtaíocht um chomhionannas fostaíochta
Disability: Employers are obliged to make reasonable accommodations for staff with disabilities
Míchumas: Tá sé de dhualgas ar fhostóirí freastal réasúnta a dhéanamh ar baill foirne faoi mhíchumas
This includes providing access to employment, enabling people with disabilities to participate in employment including promotion, and training
Áirítear leis seo rochtain a sholáthar d’fhostaíocht, cur ar chumas daoine faoi mhíchumais páirt a ghlacadh i bhfostaíocht agus in oiliúint agus arduithe céime a fháil
Pregnancy: Pregnancy-related discrimination is discrimination on the ground of gender and includes recruitment, promotion and general conditions of employment
Toircheas: Idirdhealú ar bhunús inscne is ea idirdhealú a bhaineann le toircheas agus áirítear leis cúrsaí earcaíochta, arduithe céime agus coinníollacha ginearálta fostaíochta
Women who are pregnant or have recently given birth are also protected under maternity protection and unfair dismissals legislation
Tugann an reachtaíocht a bhaineann le cosaint mháithreachais agus dífhostú éagórach cosaint do mhná atá ag iompar clainne nó ar rugadh leanaí dóibh le deireanas
Equal pay: Employment equality legislation provides for equal pay for like work
Pá comhionann: Déanann reachtaíocht chomhionannas fostaíochta soláthar don phá comhionann ar an gcineál céanna oibre
Like work is defined as work that is the same, similar or work of equal value
Is é an sainmhíniú atá ar an gcineál céanna oibre ná an obair chéanna, obair atá cosúil nó obair ar aon luach
It is one of the terms that must be part of the contract of employment as a result of laws passed by the Dail
Is é téarma nach mór a bheith mar pháirt den chonradh fostaíochta de bharr reachtaíochta atá rith tríd an Dáil
A claim for equal pay can be made on any of the 9 grounds listed above
Is féidir éilimh ar phá comhionann a dhéanamh ar aon cheann de na 9 gcúis thuas
Harassment including sexual harassment that is based on any of the 9 grounds is a form of discrimination in relation to conditions of employment
Ciapadh: Idirdhealú ó thaobh dálaí fostaíochta is ea ciapadh lena n-áirítear ciapadh gnéasach bunaithe ar aon cheann den 9 bhunús thuas
Bullying at work which is linked to one of the 9 discriminatory grounds above comes under employment equality legislation
Má bhaineann bulaíocht san ionad oibre le ceann ar bith de na 9 mbunús idirdhealaithe thuas cuimsíonn an reachtaíocht chomhionannais fostaíochta í
Victimisation: Under employment equality legisation you are protected against victimisation if you bring a claim or are involved in a complaint of unlawful discrimination against your employer

Íospairt: Cosnaíonn an reachtaíocht chomhionannas fostaíochta thú in aghaidh íospairt má dhéanann tú éileamh maidir le hidirdhealú mídhleathach in aghaidh d’fhostóra nó má tá páirt agat ina leithéid de ghearán
This means that your employer may not penalise you by dismissal, unfair treatment or an unfavourable change in your conditions of employment
Ciallaíonn sé seo nach féidir le d'fhostóir pionós a chur ort trí dhífhostú, caitheamh leat go míchothrom, nó athrú neamhfhabhrach a dhéanamh ar do choinníollacha fostaíochta
The Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission and the Workplace Relations Commission are separate organisations that work to ensure equality at work
Dhá eagraíocht faoi leith iad Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas agus Coimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre a oibríonn le cinntiú go mbeidh comhionannas san ionad oibre
The Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission is a statutory body set up to provide information to the public on human rights and equality legislation
Comhlacht reachtúil is ea an Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas a bunaíodh le faisnéis a sholáthar don phobal faoi reachtaíocht chomhionannais agus um chearta an duine
It can, at its discretion, provide legal assistance to people who wish to bring claims to the Equality Tribunal
Féadfaidh sé ar a lánrogha cúnamh dlí a sholáthar do dhaoine ar mhian leo éilimh a thabhairt chun an Bhinse Comhionannais
You can find the booklet, Your Employment Equality Rights Explained on ihrec.ie
Tá bileog maidir le do chearta chomhionannais fostaíochta ar fáil ar ihrec.ie
The Workplace Relations Commission is the place to bring a discrimation claim under the Employment Equality Acts 1998–2015 using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie)

Is chuig an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre ar cóir éileamh maidir le hidirdhealú faoi na hAchtanna um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta 1998-2015 a thabhairt tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
It investigates or mediates claims of unlawful discrimination under equality legislation
Scrúdaíonn an Coimisiún éilimh faoi idirdhealú mídhleathach faoin reachtaíocht chomhionannais nó déanann sé idirghabháil faoin scéal
